This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Same-Origin xslt
FAIL Same-site xslt promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "TypeError: Cannot read property 'trim' of undefined"
FAIL Cross-site xslt promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "TypeError: Cannot read property 'trim' of undefined"
